content.description: The writer wants sentence 11 (reproduced below) to serve as evidence that reinforces the argument of the passage.
content.question: In the 1980s, a brief attempt to relocate the goats was met with public outcry.Which of the following versions of the underlined portion of sentence 11 best accomplishes this goal?

choices.label: had no impact on the amount of erosion in the region
proved difficult as the goats retreated to areas that were challenging for humans to access
resulted in noticeable improvements in the park’s environment

content.answer: resulted in noticeable improvements in the park’s environment

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Develop paragraphs comprised of a claim and evidence that supports the claim.
